string.value: Anyway, how's that baby Lioner doing? I better check on it at Maya's house.
Maya decided to disguise Lionel as a housecat by dressing it up with a necklace. Since buying one at a local department store may give it away, she wanted me to ask Teo of Lith Harbor for help.
Teo decided to help make Lionel's necklace.
Hi there. Don't worry. I won't forget all you've done for me. \nLook, look at Lionel! The baby's cured!\nHahah, look at Lionel nuzzling against your legs! Lionel must really like you!

It really is one quiet, subdued baby, to the point where I can't imagine it being a monster. I'd love to be with it until the end, but I know that's not going to happen. I plan on freeing Lionel once it is fully healthy. The problem is that, until I do so, I HAVE to keep it inside this house. I know it's not right to keep it indoors at all times, but... no one else better recognize what's in here. Lionel may not come out here alive if that happens.

Oh yeah! \nIf we disguise it to where it doesn't look like a monster, by dressing it up with... a necklace! It'll make Lionel look like a housecat. \nLook! It's so small and adorable. I think it's a great idea! Let's make a necklace for Lionel!
...but, if I buy it here, I'll attract unwanted attention anyway. But...if I ask Teo of Lith Harbor for a little favor, he'll do it for me. Can you ask him for me?
Thank you so much. Please Say hi to Teo for me.
I see. If you ever change your mind, please talk to me.
Hey there, long time! \nWhat? What did Maya do? Is she sick again?

...hmmm, I understand what you're saying. \nThere's an old saying that "the sickness starts from within," and it makes sense that she's been healthy ever since adopting a new "pet". I am not an expert at this, but anyway, I'll do anything for that little girl.
